channel.title: CNH Industrial on FinanClub

item.title: CNHI
item.description: score:24 Chances: CNH Industrial (CNHI) recently completed the voluntary delisting of its shares from Euronext Milan and began single listing on the New York Stock Exchange, which marks a significant step in the company’s ongoing simplification journey. The company’s Agriculture segment has been making significant contributions by designing, manufacturing, and distributing a full line of farm machinery and implements, which demonstrates potential for future growth and revenue.
